query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cost_records (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  skuId INT NOT NULL,
  yearMonth VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL,
  calculationType ENUM('standard', 'weighted_average', 'simulation') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'standard',
  directMaterialCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  directLaborCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  indirectCostAllocation DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  freightCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  taxCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  lossCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  totalUnitCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  productionVolume DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
  bomSnapshot JSON,
  laborSnapshot JSON,
  indirectSnapshot JSON,
  freightSnapshot JSON,
  lossPercentage DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
  notes TEXT,
  isSimulation BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  isClosed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  closedAt BIGINT,
  closedBy VARCHAR(100),
  createdBy VARCHAR(100),
  createdAt BIGINT NOT NULL,
  updatedAt BIGINT NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3uYwUxtivMj8soi.e2c3e95bc24b --database aAFi3UvfwvVXettMY36Wvq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cost_records (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  skuId INT NOT NULL,
  yearMonth VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL,
  calculationType ENUM('standard', 'weighted_average', 'simulation') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'standard',
  directMaterialCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  directLaborCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  indirectCostAllocation DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  freightCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  taxCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  lossCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  totalUnitCost DECIMAL(12,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  productionVolume DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
  bomSnapshot JSON,
  laborSnapshot JSON,
  indirectSnapshot JSON,
  freightSnapshot JSON,
  lossPercentage DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
  notes TEXT,
  isSimulation BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  isClosed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  closedAt BIGINT,
  closedBy VARCHAR(100),
  createdBy VARCHAR(100),
  createdAt BIGINT NOT NULL,
  updatedAt BIGINT NOT NULL
);
